message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I'm looking for a more affordable option. Would you consider selling it to me for $130?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a more affordable option. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $140?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still hoping to find a price closer to my budget. Could you consider $135?
I understand you're trying to stick to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. How about we meet at $137.50?
I'm glad we're getting closer, Alice. Considering your last offer, I'd like to propose $136 for the product.
I'm getting close to your target price, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $138?
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering your last offer, I would like to propose $137 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I think $139 is the best I can do. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose $138 for the product.
